first, you must go download the deb of zsnes from the ubuntu packages

those dependencies are actually 32 bit libraries.  They're for running any 32 bit program in 64 bit ubuntu.  I originally found them while attempting to install skype.
dpkg usually resolves dependencies automagically like synaptic.  The ia32-libs just allows you to use --force-architecture
